issue.title: a function to tell whether the Light is visible

content.raw:
One more scenario, i need to turn off all the light in scene for capturing picture.

First, i turn all the lights in scene.

Capture a picture.

Then i want to set light to their original states, but i have no method to know their original states.

And i think it's easy to achieve through Ogre's API.
